content.rendered:
(*11*)

At PALOVUE continued innovation is our mantra, and that applies to each the technological advances in our merchandise, but additionally the aesthetics. Good design is vital too, and with our newest headphones, the SweetFlow, obtainable in two colourways – black or white – and as well as, we’re giving our prospects the same old nice sound and look they’ve come to anticipate, but additionally at a price that’s laborious to disregard. Compatible with iPhones, iPads and iPods with a Lightning connection to provide the finest audio sign doable, our new fashions are designed to convey high quality and worth to our ever rising line of followers.

(*12*)

(*7*)

(*8*)

Crisp & Clean Audio

PALOVUE SweetFlow are MFi-certified to make sure final compatibility with your iPhone, iPod or iPad*. So, no want for an adaptor. With the Lightning connection, you get audio as pure and crisp, as digital audio was supposed, delivered from the thoughts of the artist, to the recording studio, and at last to your ears (and coronary heart) in a single steady line.

*See record of suitable units beneath

Premium Quality on a funds

The SweetFlow line, obtainable in white or black, are designed to look good in any state of affairs, however above and beneath the floor, these buds are designed to final, with bolstered TPE coating for the cables, Oxygen-free copper wire for glorious information transmission, alongside with a chrome steel body to guard the Apple licensed Lighting connector. The earbuds boast 10mm dynamic drivers for persistently clear sound.

Direct, Simple Control

With the included MEMS controller, together with built-in microphone, you cannot solely play, pause and skip tracks, but additionally take, finish and reject calls to your iPhone, alongside with activate Siri (Apple’s voice assistant). All achievable with the multi management linked to the headphone cable, for the last word in management, however discrete and handy sufficient that you do not have to get your telephone out each time you wish to reply a name or skip tracks.

(*12*)

Your Taste, Your Choice

SweetFlow is accessible in two colourways, to maintain issues tremendous easy, so you’ve white or black to select from. Either method, you may flip heads with the trendy however understated design.

Dynamic Audio

10mm Dynamic Drivers, to ship strong, deep bass tones, clear mids, and clear excessive finish frequencies, all balanced to present the audio a balanced wealthy tone, no matter you are listening to.

Made For Each Other

Being formally MFi licensed ensures your SweetFlow earbuds shall be totally suitable with your iPhone, iPad or iPod*, providing you with fuss-free enjoyment, straight out of the field.

MEMS Control

As our SweetFlow Earbuds are formally MFI Certified, all of the controls you may ever have to play, pause or skip a monitor are all obtainable through the in-line controls that additionally will let you summon Siri, your favourite voice assistant.

(*12*)

Why People Choose PALOVUE

Elegant Design

Comfortable ear items in two colorways, guarantee there is a proper ‘match’ for you. Quality materials used all through to make sure you really feel assured in a effectively crafted product.

MFi Certified

With the Lightning connector, your audio will get out of your gadget to your ears in as pure and unadulterated method as doable. Music the best way is was meant to be heard.

Safe and Sound

As with all of our vary, SweetFlow are designed to remain put what ever they undergo, so that you might be assured of problem free use, the minute you put on them.

Compatibility

  • iPhone 12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max
  • iPhone X/XS/XS Max/XR/SE
  • iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max
  • iPhone 6/6Plus/6S/6S Plus/7/7Plus/8/8Plus
  • iPad fifth/sixth/seventh Gen
  • iPad Pro 9.7in/10.5in/12.9in[1st/2nd Gen]
  • iPad mini 2/3/4/5 | iPad Air 1/2/3
  • iPod Touch (sixth/seventh Gen)

(*12*)

Quality and Durability – The dependable product high quality, plus our accountable alternative coverage, are equal to your regular listening expertise, vendor PALOVUE Provide 24 Months Warranty and 120 Days Money Back Guaranteed
